mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (dclsMonth, finCoNo, korCoNm, finPrdtCd, finPrdtNm, joinWay, mtrtInt, spclCnd, joinMember, etcNote, type) VALUES (#{dclsMonth}, #{finCoNo}, #{korCoNm}, #{finPrdtCd}, #{finPrdtNm}, #{joinWay}, #{mtrtInt}, #{spclCnd}, #{joinMember}, #{etcNote}, #{type})
INSERT INTO `option` (dclsMonth, finCoNo, finPrdtCd, saveTrm, intrRate, intrRate2, type) VALUES (#{dclsMonth}, #{finCoNo}, #{finPrdtCd}, #{saveTrm}, #{intrRate}, #{intrRate2}, #{type})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product WHERE korCoNm LIKE '%국민%'

SELECT count(*) FROM product WHERE korCoNm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR finPrdtNm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR mtrtInt LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR spclCnd LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT * FROM product WHERE korCoNm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR finPrdtNm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR mtrtInt LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR spclCnd LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT p.*, o.intrRate, o.intrRate2, o.saveTrm FROM product p JOIN `option` o ON p.finPrdtCd = o.finPrdtCd WHERE CAST(o.saveTrm AS UNSIGNED) < #{period} ORDER BY GREATEST(o.intrRate, o.intrRate2) DESC LIMIT 2
SELECT CASE WHEN loanAmount IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS loanAmount_status FROM `userAsset` WHERE userId = #{userId} ORDER BY createDate DESC LIMIT 1;
